name: Dis.Array
description: The Game is a built in a 3D space with a 2.5D gameplay, it is a interactive puzzle game where we have a small robot who is looking for his master, and to do so he has to transverse his memories, this is when he goes to the world he has two planes, the original and digital plane, here he has to solve puzzles by interacting with objects and using the player guidance to reach to the end to know what happned to his master.
